Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum stability on the court. Stability and ground control for serious handball players.
Product.WebProfile:
Designed to meet the demands of modern handball, the GEL-BLAST 5 offers handball players the stability and ground control they need.

This edition’s Flexion Fit Construction optimises fit and comfort, and will also add stability.

The shoe’s Extended Trusstic adds stability and enhances running power, along with a Propulsion Plate for more stability in the forefoot.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, and allows easy forward and sideways movement.

To create better traction on indoor surfaces the outsole is made of Wet Grip Rubber, while the Magic Sole ensures breathability.

The Personal Heel Fit and Asymmetrical Lacing Design combine to create a secure and personalised fit.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: ASICS® design philosophy that employs linked componentry to enhance the foot's natual gait from heel strike to toe-off.
Anatomically correct lacing environment that reduces potential for irritation and provides increased comfort and fit.
An outsole made from a special blend of organic and non-organic components, designed to enhance traction even on wet surfaces.
2 layers of memory foam line the collar and mold to the athlete's heel, creating a personalized fit.
ASICS midsole material takes on a new role as a lasting technology for enhanced cushioning and comfort.

Feature.FeatureName: Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL® Cushioning System
Feature.FeatureBenefit: Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
A dual-density midsole system positioned to enhance support and stability, positioned sport-specifically.
EVA sockliner moulded to the shape of the foot, which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.
Reinforced rubber/resin compound attached to the forefoot providing increased durability and protection.
For stability and comfort. Upper is stitched around a canvas or EVA board and directly attached to the midsole.
Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoes.
Improves bounce-back characteristics and decreases midsole breakdown.
Vented midsole and outsole minimizes weight and maximizes breathability.
Upper technology which offers stability, comfort and breathability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Great support on all your training runs. Combining performance and stability for late-stage overpronators.
Product.WebProfile:
The famous GEL-3000 series has a new name: GT-3000. But the shoe's mission hasn't changed: to optimally combine performance and stability for late-stage overpronators.

The GT-3000 is significantly lighter and has a slightly lowered midsole to create more flexibility and responsiveness.

Its new Guidance Trusstic is designed to work with the Guidance Line along the outsole, encouraging a smooth and more efficient gait while giving support to the midfoot.

Unique in the GT-3000 is the forefoot DuoMax, which helps late-stage overpronators to a more efficient push-off. It also contains the Dynamic DuoMax Support System, a dual density midsole that offers superb stability.

The Clutch Counter creates a snug, supportive and dynamic fit around your heel.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Removable sockliner that provides cushioning performance and anti-microbial properties for a cooler, dryer, healthier environment.
A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA®. Also fetures enhanced cushioning and durability.
Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.
This Trusstic System integrates Guidance construction for enhanced gait efficiency while providing midfoot structural integrity.
Vertical flex groove decouples the tooling along the line of progression for enhanced gait efficiency.
ASICS® design philosophy that employs linked componentry to enhance the foot's natual gait from heel strike to toe-off.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum speed on the court. A low-profile, high-tech shoe for agile squash and badminton players.
Product.WebProfile:
The high-tech GEL-BLADE 4 has been designed exclusively for the fast indoor court sports of squash and badminton. Catering to quick and agile players, it has a low profile and great responsiveness.

A squash professional who tested the GEL-BLADE 4 called it “the quickest and most comfortable squash shoe I’ve ever worn.”

In this edition the new pivot points and the new flex grooves in the outsole, dividing the medial and lateral forefoot, promote more efficient and aggressive turns and sideward movements.

The shoe’s Transition Midsole supports quick changes in direction, while the more centred and rounded heel accommodates for lunging movements.

To ensure optimal traction on court surfaces, the outsole is made of Wet Grip Rubber, with a large Pivot Point in the forefoot for easier and faster turning. The Magic Sole ensures breathability.

On the upper, the TPU protected vamp adds support and durability, while the Personal Heel Fit and Asymmetrical Lacing Design create a snug and personalised fit.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Superb cushioning for your training runs. A cushioned trainer with a super plush platform feel.
Product.WebProfile:
A cushioned trainer with a super plush platform feel, the GEL-Cumulus 15 provides better comfort than ever.

New in this edition is the full-length SpEVA lasting delivering extra bounce back. Along with the Visible Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL, it absorbs shock when your foot lands to provide a fantastic cushioned ride.

The women’s model features Gender Specific Cushioning, making the midsole’s top layer softer to accommodate for women’s lower body weight and create a more cushioned ride designed exclusively for women.

It also includes the Full Length Guidance Line, a groove along the sole that guides your foot through the gait cycle and helps you run more efficiently, even when fatigue sets in.

The Discrete Eyestay Construction on the upper improves the overall fit by allowing each eyelet to pull directly from the base of the shoe.

The GEL-CUMULUS 15 G-TX features a weatherproof yet breathable GORE-TEX upper to protect your foot in extreme weather conditions.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Excellent cushioning on longer runs. With its excellent cushioning and fit, this shoe is perfect for longer runs.
Product.WebProfile:
GT-2000 is the new name of the latest model in the award-winning GEL-2000 series. Naturally it continues to deliver impressive comfort and fit for overpronators.

The new Guidance Trusstic is designed to work with the Guidance Line along the outsole. Together they encourage a more efficient gait, guiding your foot from heel strike to toe-off, while also giving support to the midfoot.

Also new in the GT-2000 is the Dynamic DuoMax Support System, a dual density midsole with a softer top layer for more sensory feedback and added comfort.

The full length and double density Solyte midsole has a top layer that's softer and better cushioned.

The lightweight Hotmelt upper, containing less stitches and less potential for irritation, improves comfort.

With its excellent cushioning and fit, the GT-2000 is perfect for longer runs.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Optimal performance for your races. Geared for race day performance while providing ample support.
Product.WebProfile:
The 9th edition of the popular GEL-DS RACER is geared for race day performance, and ideal for overpronators.

The GEL-DS RACER 9 is the only ASICS racing shoe to feature a Solyte midsole with a DuoMax Support System, making the shoe lighter while still providing ample support.

It also contains the ASICS Racing Specific Last to create a very snug fit.

The new Magic Sole provides grip while improving ventilation, keeping fast feet cool.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Off-road traction for winter running. A new lightweight and dynamic ice and snow runner.
Product.WebProfile:
The new GEL-FUJI SETSU enriches the FUJI trail line with a lightweight and dynamic off-road shoe specially designed for running in all winter conditions.

The Rearfoot GEL Cushioning unit absorbs shock and combines with the Solyte midsole to offer a cushioned ride while remaining very lightweight for running in the snow.

The large lugs on the outsole give better grip on uphill and downhill tracks. The outsole also features strategically placed metal pins to ensure you have optimal grip on icy and snowy trails.

The GEL-FUJI SETSU G-TX features a breathable GORE-TEX upper for protection in extreme weather conditions.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Cushioning and comfort on the field. A midlevel field hockey shoe with excellent cushioning and comfort.
Product.WebProfile:
A great midlevel field hockey shoe, the GEL-LETHAL MP5 offers excellent cushioning and comfort.

The Rearfoot GEL Cushioning absorbs shock and allows for a smooth transition from the landing of your foot to midstance.

The Trusstic System in the sole reduces the shoe’s weight while the California lasting ensures a stable and comfortable platform.

The GEL-LETHAL MP5 features cleats suitable for both sand and water-based turfs.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum speed on the court. The new flagship handball shoe designed for fast and agile wingers.
Product.WebProfile:
The new flagship handball shoe, the GEL-FIREBLAST was developed in collaboration with top players from HSV and designed for fast and agile wingers.

This shoe is lightweight and flexible without sacrificing on stability. The DuoMax midsole offers support and stability, and the Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL add trusted ASICS cushioning.

Promoting speed and efficiency of movement, the Propulsion Trusstic is aided by the newly designed flex groove structure in the outsole which is optimised for aggressive forward and lateral movement.

The Wet Grip Rubber outsole creates optimal traction on court surfaces, while the Magic Sole offers breathability.

On the upper, the PU construction protects your foot and improves durability, while the Asymmetrical Lacing Design and Personal Heel Fit ensure a snug, personalised fit.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum jumping power. A lightweight volleyball shoe for agile players with great jumping power.
Product.WebProfile:
Designed in collaboration with the Dutch National Team, the GEL-VOLLEY ELITE 2 addresses the need for a lightweight, low cut volleyball shoe for agile players with great jumping power.

The combination of this model’s new dual-density midsole and the Propulsion Trusstic was shown to enhance both vertical and horizontal jumping power.

This edition is also significantly lighter without sacrificing on cushioning. The Forefoot and Rearfoot GEL continue to provide excellent cushioning on indoor courts.

The redesigned upper offers better durability. The Asymmetrical Lacing Design and Personal Heel Fit further ensure an optimal, personalised fit.

For optimal traction on court surfaces the outsole is made of Wet Grip Rubber.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Made to last on longer walks. A comfortable and durable comfort walking shoe with a sleek profile.
Product.WebProfile:
The GEL-ODYSSEY is a comfortable and durable comfort walking shoe, made to last on longer walks. The new edition has an exciting new look with a sleeker profile.

This model features a Full Length Guidance Line, a groove along the sole that guides your foot through the gait cycle and encourages a more efficient gait, even (and especially) when your feet get tired.

The DuoMax Support System in the midsole lends ample support and stability, while the Solyte 55 material creates a plush platform feel.

To ensure greater durability, the outsole is reinforced with AHAR+.

This low cut shoe features Forefoot GEL Cushioning to create a great ride for the gym.

The AYAMi ZONE features a mesh upper for breathability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: All the cushioning you need on your runs. A popular and great value running shoe with a fantastic ride.
Product.WebProfile:
GT-1000 is the new name of the hugely popular and great value GEL-1000 series. Designed for moderate overpronators, the GT-1000 offers all the cushioning and support you need.

The GT-1000 is the lightest model yet, featuring a slightly lowered midsole height to create more flexibility and responsiveness.

The new Full Length Guidance Line adds a groove along the length of the outsole to guide your foot in a more efficient gait.

Besides ample cushioning from its Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL units, this edition contains the DuoMax Support System in the midsole to create enhanced support and stability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Responsible natural running. A supportive and responsible natural running shoe with a low profile.
Product.WebProfile:
Inspired by the premium ASICS 33 collection, the GEL-ZARACA 2 is a natural running shoe that promotes a supportive and responsible way of natural running.

For this second edition the GEL-ZARACA received a visual make-over, resulting in a new and very sleek, low-profile image.

The flexible midsole gives you a more natural road feel and running experience, while the Full Length Guidance Line helps you run more efficiently, encouraging optimum foot positioning from foot down to toe off.

The GEL Cushioning in the rearfoot protects your foot from the shock of impact when you run.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum speed on the cricket pitch. A fast performance driven cricket batting shoe.
Product.WebProfile:
Inspired by track shoes, the GEL-STRIKE RATE 3 offers batters the speed and support they need on the cricket field.

The DuoMax material in the midsole is positioned to enhance support and stability for short sprints.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, and allows easy forward and sideways movement.

The Personal Heel Fit adds a collar of memory foam in the heel to create a great personalised fit.

The GEL-STRIKE RATE 3 features a unique pin system locking the seven forefoot studs in to create more aggressive traction.

The outsole is reinforced with ASICS High Abrasion Resistance rubber to make it more durable.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum speed on the rugby field. A lightweight performance rugby boot designed for speed.
Product.WebProfile:
The LETHAL HYBRID 4 offers Lethal performance in a lightweight rugby boot with an innovative outsole design.

It features a 10mm Heel Gradient, shifting your body mass forward to reduce strain on your legs and put you in the best position

The shoe’s Rearfoot GEL Cushioning absorbs impact shock upon landing and allows for a smooth transition from the landing of your foot to midstance.

The DuoMax Support System in the midsole lends stability and support throughout.

This remarkably lightweight shoe has a wider platform than regular for ASICS running shoes to further enhance its stable ride.

An exiting new technology is the Guidance Trusstic that works with the Guidance Line along the outsole. Together they encourage a more efficient gait while giving support to the midfoot.

The shoe of choice for professional tennis players, the GEL-RESOLUTION 5 offers stability and durability tailored especially to baseline players.

The GEL-RESOLUTION 5 is the first tennis shoe on the market designed exclusively for women. The Gender Specific Forefoot Inlay creates a softer and more stable platform for sideways movement, and encourages a more efficient push-off.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, and allows easy forward and sideways movement.

The Flexion Fit in the forefoot combines mesh and rubber to create a breathable and very flexible yet durable upper.

The shoe's outsole is slightly thicker on the medial side of your foot to accommodate for sideways movements.

Product.StandfirstDescription: The cutting edge cushioning shoe. The cutting edge in cushioning packed with the latest in running technology.
Product.WebProfile:
The GEL-KINSEI 5 takes the series in an exciting new direction, representing the cutting edge in the ASICS Cushioning category where early adopters can experience the latest in running technology.

This edition manages to reduce the shoe’s weight considerably.

It also introduces a new upper of FluidFit two-direction stretch mesh, which combines with the External Heel Counter and Discrete Eyestay Construction to create a luxurious glove-like fit.

The Full Length Guidance Line and a Propulsion Trusstic work together to promote a more efficient gait, create a smooth impact to toe-off transition and assist your foot in propelling you forward.

Of course the GEL-KINSEI 5 also includes both Forefoot and Rearfoot GEL to provide a fantastic cushioned ride.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.
EVA sockliner moulded to the shape of the foot, which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.
Stretch material strategically placed on the upper helps to reduce buckling and the potential for irritation.
Vertical flex groove decouples the tooling along the line of progression for enhanced gait efficiency.
ASICS® design philosophy that employs linked componentry to enhance the foot's natual gait from heel strike to toe-off.
Mimics connective tissue in the foot by creating tension as foot enters propulsion stage.

Feature.FeatureName: Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL® Cushioning System
Feature.FeatureBenefit: Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Exceptional comfort on all your runs. The flagship cushioning shoe offering the ultimate plush ride.
Product.WebProfile:
The flagship cushioning shoe in the ASICS collection, the GEL-NIMBUS 15 provides exceptional comfort and cushioning for neutral and underpronating runners.

This 15th edition can safely be called the most comfortable edition ever. It introduces a new upper of FluidFit two-direction stretch mesh. Along with the Heel Clutching System and Discrete Eyestay Construction it ensures a superb customised fit.

Also adding to the shoe’s great comfort are the full-length SpEVA lasting and the innovative FluidRide midsole construction which provide the ultimate plush ride.

The Trusstic System included in the men’s edition offers a bit more torsional rigidity for added support.

The Full Length Guidance Line, a groove along the sole, guides your foot through the gait cycle and helps you run more efficiently, even when fatigue sets in.

With its high-tech cushioned ride the GEL-NIMBUS 15 is your ideal partner on long runs.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Independently placed eyelets disperse lace tension, creating a customized fit environment and enhanced upper comfort.
Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.
EVA sockliner moulded to the shape of the foot, which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.
This Trusstic System integrates Guidance construction for enhanced gait efficiency while providing midfoot structural integrity.
Vertical flex groove decouples the tooling along the line of progression for enhanced gait efficiency.
ASICS® design philosophy that employs linked componentry to enhance the foot's natual gait from heel strike to toe-off.
The latest evolution in ASICS midsole technology. FluidRide provides the ultimate in bounce back & cushioning characterics while being lightweight.
ASICS FluidFit technology combines a technical mesh that stretches in multiple directions with other stretch materials to create a glove like fit.

Feature.FeatureName: Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL® Cushioning System
Feature.FeatureBenefit: Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.

Product.StandfirstDescription: A cushioned ride for kids. Great value running shoe for kids offering cushioning and durability.
Product.WebProfile:
The GEL-GALAXY 6 SL PS is an all-round cushioned trainer offering great value for kids who like to run.

It has a narrower shape than adult models to improve fit for children’s feet.

The Rearfoot GEL Cushioning absorbs shock when your foot lands and provides a fantastic ride. The Trusstic System reduces the shoe’s weight while creating better stability in the midfoot.

The outsole is reinforced with ASICS High Abrasion Rubber to reduce excessive wear, and it has a stitched toe to make it more durable.

The GEL-GALAXY 6 SL PS edition features a synthetic leather upper for greater durability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Optimal performance for track and road races. A versatile racer perfect for on the road and around the track.
Product.WebProfile:
The GEL-HYPERSPEED 5 is a versatile racer perfectly suited for performance both on the road and around the track.

It contains the ASICS Racing Specific Last which creates a very snug fit.

This edition includes Magic Sole, for improved ventilation, as well as a WetGrip Outsole, designed to ensure traction even on wet surfaces.

The GEL-HYPERSPEED 5 also features a new lightweight and breathable upper design.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
EVA sockliner moulded to the shape of the foot, which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.
Built on ASICS’ Racing Last.
Vented midsole and outsole minimizes weight and maximizes breathability.
For lightweight and flexibility. Upper is wrapped and stitched before it is glued to the midsole.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum speed on the field. Made for speed on the hockey field, lightweight and with a snug fit.
Product.WebProfile:
Lightweight and with a snug fit, the second edition of the GEL-HOCKEY NEO is made for speed on the hockey field.

The GEL-HOCKEY NEO 2 contains both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL for excellent cushioning and shock absorption.

The DuoMax Support System in the midsole enhances support and stability for both forward and sideways movement, while the Solyte midsole material and Trusstic System help to reduce the shoe's weight.

The shoe also features slightly shorter cleats optimised for water-based turfs.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA®. Also fetures enhanced cushioning and durability.
EVA sockliner moulded to the shape of the foot, which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.
For stability and comfort. Upper is stitched around a canvas or EVA board and directly attached to the midsole.
New blown AHAR outsole material. Delivers enhanced cushioning, durability and ride to the foot.
Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoes.
ASICS lightest midsole material takes on a new role as a lasting technology.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
A dual-density midsole system positioned to enhance support and stability, positioned sport-specifically.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Optimal stability on all your hikes. A lightweight and well-cushioned off-road hiking and walking shoe.
Product.WebProfile:
A lightweight and well-cushioned hiking shoe, the new GEL-FUJI STORM is ideal for all your shorter and longer off-road hikes and walks.

This model includes both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning to absorb shock, while the DuoTrusstic assists your foot in toe-off to create a great active ride.

The SpEVA midsole and SpEVA lasting create extra cushioning and stability on rough terrain.

The Personal Heel Fit memory foam fits snugly around the heel to create a personalised fit.

The rubberised toe offers protection on uneven terrain, while the Wet Grip Outsole ensures excellent grip on wet surfaces. It is reinforced with AHAR+ for enhanced durability.

The GEL-FUJI STORM G-TX features a weatherproof yet breathable GORE-TEX upper to protect your foot in extreme weather conditions.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Removable sockliner that provides cushioning performance and anti-microbial properties for a cooler, dryer, healthier environment.
Waterproof and breathable upper designed to protect the foot during extreme weather conditions.
Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
EVA sockliner moulded to the shape of the foot, which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.
Special tongue construction that prevents debris entering the shoe.
ASICS® design philosophy that employs linked componentry to enhance the foot's natual gait from heel strike to toe-off.
Reflective material produced by 3M company, for night safety.
An outsole made from a special blend of organic and non-organic components, designed to enhance traction even on wet surfaces.
New blown AHAR outsole material. Delivers enhanced cushioning, durability and ride to the foot.
Enhances rearfoot to forefoot transition upon jumping, maximizing power, and acts as a rearfoot stabilizer upon landing.
Improves bounce-back characteristics and decreases midsole breakdown.
2 layers of memory foam line the collar and mold to the athlete's heel, creating a personalized fit.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Optimal performance for shorter-distance races. The lightest ASICS racer, designed for elite runners.
Product.WebProfile:
The lightest model in the ASICS speed collection, the PIRANHA SP 4 provides elite runners with a next-to-nothing race feel suitable for 5km, 10km and up to half-marathon races.

This model features a nearly seamless upper to prevent irritation and improve comfort.

The lightweight DuoSole Outsole creates flexibility while maintaining traction and durability.

The PIRANHA SP 4 is part of the ASICS 2012 London Summer Olympics Racing Collection.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA®. Also fetures enhanced cushioning and durability.
Built on ASICS’ Racing Last.
For lightweight and flexibility. Upper is wrapped and stitched before it is glued to the midsole.
Outsole construction that offers lightweight flexibility and traction.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Excellent cushioning on longer runs. With its excellent cushioning and fit, this shoe is perfect for longer runs.
Product.WebProfile:
GT-2000 is the new name of the latest model in the award-winning GEL-2000 series. Naturally it continues to deliver impressive comfort and fit for overpronators.

The new Guidance Trusstic is designed to work with the Guidance Line along the outsole. Together they encourage a more efficient gait, guiding your foot from heel strike to toe-off, while also giving support to the midfoot.

Also new in the GT-2000 is the Dynamic DuoMax Support System, a dual density midsole with a softer top layer for more sensory feedback and added comfort.

The full length and double density Solyte midsole has a top layer that's softer and better cushioned.

The lightweight Hotmelt upper, containing less stitches and less potential for irritation, improves comfort.

With its excellent cushioning and fit, the GT-2000 is perfect for longer runs.

Product.StandfirstDescription: More responsive cushioning. For neutral runners who like to have a more responsive ride.
Product.WebProfile:
New in the Cushioning category is the GEL-KUROW, a high-tech shoe catering to neutral runners who like to have a more responsive ride while still getting ample cushioning.

This model features both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL to provide superb cushioning. This is further enhanced by the double-density Solyte midsole which offers extra cushioning and comfort.

The shoe’s Full Length Guidance Line and the Guidance Trusstic work together to promote a more efficient gait, especially when fatigue sets in.

The GEL-KUROW features a Clutch Counter on the upper, an exoskelatal heel counter that guarantees a snug, supportive and dynamic fit around your heel.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Off-road comfort and protection. A long-standing off-road favourite delivering comfort and protection.
Product.WebProfile:
A long-standing off-road favourite, the GEL-FUJI TRABUCO NEUTRAL delivers comfort and protection. This edition introduces a new upper that’s cleaner and more comfortable.

The NEUTRAL version is specifically designed for trail runners with a neutral gait.

This all-round trail shoe has a full ground contact midsole to create a very stable ride. The aggressive outsole gives you lots of traction.

The Forefoot and Rearfoot GEL Cushioning ensure superb comfort and protection, while the Rock Protection Plate is essential for protecting your foot on rugged and rocky surfaces.

The GEL-FUJI TRABUCO 2 also features 90 degrees outsole lugs to provide optimal traction on rough and steep terrain.

The Monosock Construction on the upper is designed to keep dirt and debris out of the shoe. The External Heel Counter further adds to a snug, customised fit.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA®. Also fetures enhanced cushioning and durability.
Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.
Protects the foot against sharp objects such as rocks and branches.
Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoes.
Reserved lugs provide uphill and downhill traction on all types of terrain.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Speed and ground contact on muddy trails. A lightweight trail running shoe that's perfect for off-road racing.
Product.WebProfile:
Like its successful cousin the GEL-FUJI RACER 2, the new GEL-FUJI FELL RACER is a lightweight trail running shoe designed for off-road racing.

The GEL-FUJI FELL RACER's main distinguishing feature lies in the outsole, which contains aggressive lugs for optimal traction on muddy and wet grass trails.

This model has a lower heel to forefoot gradient, helping your foot to go faster through the gait cycle and making it easier to keep your speed going downhill.

The shoe's upper has a minimal construction to prevent water absorption.

The GEL-FUJI FELL RACER features a distinctive reflective Mount Fuji logo on the heel.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA®. Also fetures enhanced cushioning and durability.
Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
Protects the foot against sharp objects such as rocks and branches.
Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoes.
Reserved lugs provide uphill and downhill traction on all types of terrain.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Comfort on your longer trail runs. A lightweight, comfortable and adaptive shoe ideal for longer trail runs .
Product.WebProfile:
Developed in collaboration with elite trail runners, the lightweight GEL-FUJI SENSOR 2 is made for comfort on your longer trail runs, with a responsive and adaptive ride that gives you a greater feel of the ground.

This edition achieves a significant weight reduction. The new double-density midsole with a softer top layer, in combination with the Rearfoot GEL Cushioning, improves comfort on long distances.

Also new is the full ground contact outsole, ensuring firmer ground contact with each landing to create more control and stability.

The large lugs on the outsole have been repositioned to correspond with the angle of your foot on landing and push-off for better grip on uphill and downhill tracks.

The Trail Sensor System which gave this shoe its name continues to provide unrivalled flexibility in the forefoot and traction on uneven terrain.

The water repellent mesh on the upper keeps the shoe’s weight down under all weather conditions. Along with the Discrete Eyestay Construction and the External Heel Counter, it results in a superb customised fit.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Independently placed eyelets disperse lace tension, creating a customized fit environment and enhanced upper comfort.
Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.
ASICS® design philosophy that employs linked componentry to enhance the foot's natual gait from heel strike to toe-off.

The full length double density midsole features a lower density top layer for improved cushioning and comfort. The bottom layer has a higher density that provides stability and responsiveness.
This interactive decoupling system makes sure that in every position during trail running there is surface contact.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Recharge every step of your run. A performance oriented shoe that helps you run more naturally.
Product.WebProfile:
The second edition of the GEL-HYPER33 continues to innovate with technology that helps you run more naturally.

The GEL-HYPER33 2 introduces the new FluidAxis, adding uniquely positioned deep flex grooves in the outsole to allow for a more natural motion of the subtalar joint.

This edition also contains an extended Propulsion Trusstic. Mimicking the plantar fascia in the arch of your foot, it assists your foot in propelling you forward.

The Full Length Guidance Line along the outsole promotes a more efficient gait from foot down to toe off.

The heel contains Rearfoot GEL for great cushioning, while the Dual Density Midsole, made of an EVA top layer and a Solyte layer, create a great balance of cushioning, stability and responsiveness.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
Vertical flex groove decouples the tooling along the line of progression for enhanced gait efficiency.
Mimics connective tissue in the foot by creating tension as foot enters propulsion stage.

Anatomically correct deep flex grooves have been aligned to the joints of the foot. This innovative construction enables the shoe to recognize, adapt, and respond to the athlete's exact load and positional change from first impact to toe-off.
The full length double density midsole features a lower density top layer for improved cushioning and comfort. The bottom layer has a higher density that provides stability and responsiveness.
Acronym for ASICS® High Abrasion Rubber. Placed in critical areas of the outsole for exceptional durability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum comfort and support. Run smoothly in a pair of comfortable lightweight running shoes.
Product.WebProfile:
The new GT-2000 2 has a Fluid Ride midsole made of 2 cushioned layers – giving you much more comfort and improved support.

The Guidance Line technology guides your foot from impact through to push-off. That gives you a more efficient and comfortable running style.

And these trainers cut down irritation with less stitching in the upper.

The LITE-SHOW edition features 360o visibility with all-over reflective details

Product.StandfirstDescription: Recognise, adapt, respond. An ultra natural and adaptive ride designed for serious runners.
Product.WebProfile:
The second edition of the GEL-LYTE33, available in Europe for the first time, offers an ultra natural ride designed for serious runners.

The GEL-LYTE33 2 introduces the new FluidAxis, adding uniquely positioned deep flex grooves in the outsole to allow for a more natural motion of the subtalar joint.

Aligned to the joints of your foot, the asymmetrical Dual Density Midsole works in harmony with the Guidance Line along the outsole to optimise flexibility for an adaptive and responsive ride.

The GEL-LYTE33 2 also contains Rearfoot GEL for great cushioning.

The shoe’s outsole is reinforced with ASICS High Abrasion Resistance rubber for optimal durability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum stability on the mat. Offering junior wrestlers the grip and direct feel they need on the mat.
Product.WebProfile:
Inspired by the bestselling adult shoe, the MATFLEX 4 GS offers junior wrestlers the grip and direct feel they need on the mat.

The shoe is built on the ASICS Wrestling Specific last to create a stable and comfortable platform.

The open mesh upper ensures better breathability as well as excellent comfort.

The MATFLEX 4 GS features an NC Rubber Outsole, providing enhanced traction on court surfaces.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Provides excellent comfort and breathability.
Built on ASICS’ Wrestling last.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Superb cushioning for your training runs. A cushioned trainer with a super plush platform feel.
Product.WebProfile:
A cushioned trainer with a super plush platform feel, the GEL-Cumulus 15 provides better comfort than ever.

New in this edition is the full-length SpEVA lasting delivering extra bounce back. Along with the Visible Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL, it absorbs shock when your foot lands to provide a fantastic cushioned ride.

It also includes the Full Length Guidance Line, a groove along the sole that guides your foot through the gait cycle and helps you run more efficiently, even when fatigue sets in.

The Discrete Eyestay Construction on the upper improves the overall fit by allowing each eyelet to pull directly from the base of the shoe.

Product.StandfirstDescription: A well-cushioned ride for kids. The kids version of the popular and great value running shoe.
Product.WebProfile:
Following the adult version, the 1000 series for kids has a new name: GT-1000. The kids model of the GT-1000 offers a great value and well-cushioned ride.

This model contains both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, to absorb shock when your foot lands and provide a fantastic ride. 

The inclusion of PLUS3 raises the heel to forefoot gradient to help relieve strain on on the joints, muscles and tendons of children's developing legs, while the DuoMax Support System ensures support and stability.

The outsole of the GT-1000 GS is reinforced with ASICS High Abrasion Resistance rubber to ensure greater durability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum stability on the court. Stability and performance for squash and badminton professionals.
Product.WebProfile:
Offering optimal stability and performance, the new GEL-PROGRESSIVE has been designed exclusively for the fast indoor court sports of squash and badminton.

The DuoMax material in the midsole is positioned to enhance support and stability for short sprints and turns.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, and allows easy forward and sideways movement.

The Personal Heel Fit adds a line of memory foam in the heel to create a snug, personalised fit.

The GEL-PROGRESSIVE has an outsole reinforced with ASICS High Abrasion Resistance rubber to make it more durable.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum stability on the field. Offering the stability and cushioning that modern field hockey players need.
Product.WebProfile:
The versatile GEL-BLACKHEATH 4 offers the stability and cushioning that modern field hockey players need.

The Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning absorbs shock and helps transition your foot from impact to toe-off.

The DuoMax Support System in the midsole enhances support and stability for both forward and sideways movement, while the SpEVA midsole material improves bounce back.

On the upper the Asymmetrical Lacing Design follows the shape of your foot to ensure a secure, comfortable fit.

The GEL-BLACKHEATH 4 features cleats suitable for both sand and water-based turfs.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Off-road comfort and protection. A long-standing off-road favourite delivering comfort and protection.
Product.WebProfile:
A long-standing off-road favourite, the GEL-FUJI TRABUCO delivers comfort and protection. This edition introduces a new upper that’s cleaner and more comfortable.

This all-round trail shoe has a full ground contact midsole and features a DuoMax Support System to create a very stable ride. The aggressive outsole gives you lots of traction.

The Forefoot and Rearfoot GEL Cushioning ensure superb comfort and protection, while the Rock Protection Plate is essential for protecting your foot on rugged and rocky surfaces.

The GEL-FUJI TRABUCO 2 also features 90 degrees outsole lugs to provide optimal traction on rough and steep terrain.

The Monosock Construction on the upper is designed to keep dirt and debris out of the shoe. The External Heel Counter further adds to a snug, customised fit.

The GEL-FUJI TRABUCO 2 G-TX features a breathable GORE-TEX upper for protection in extreme weather conditions.

The GEL-ODYSSEY is a comfortable and durable comfort walking shoe, made to last on longer walks. The new edition has an exciting new look with a sleeker profile.

This model features a Full Length Guidance Line, a groove along the sole that guides your foot through the gait cycle and encourages a more efficient gait, even (and especially) when your feet get tired.

The DuoMax Support System in the midsole lends ample support and stability, while the Solyte 55 material creates a plush platform feel.

To ensure greater durability, the outsole is reinforced with AHAR+.

Product.WebProfile:
The award-winning GEL-CHALLENGER series combines a classic look with state of the art technologies for tennis players. The GEL-CHALLENGER 9 offers an improved fit and better durability.

The DuoMax System in the midsole provides excellent sideways stability while the T-Truss, an extended Trusstic, offers additional support in the heel, especially for the jumping forehand stroke.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, while the Solyte midsole creates extra cushioning.

The shoe's outsole is slightly thicker on the inside of your foot to accommodate for sideways movements.

The Hotmelt upper contains less stitching, and less potential for irritation, to create a more comfortable fit. It is also more durable, especially on the inside of the shoe.

The GEL-CHALLENGER 9 OC features an outsole optimised for grip on Omnicourts.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, and allows easy forward and sideways movement.

The T-Truss, an extended Trusstic, offers additional stability in the heel, particularly for the jumping forehand stroke.

The Flexion Fit in the forefoot combines mesh and rubber to create a breathable and very flexible yet durable upper.

The shoe's outsole is slightly thicker on the medial side of your foot to accommodate for sideways movements.

Product.StandfirstDescription: All the cushioning you need on your runs. A popular and great value running shoe with a fantastic ride.
Product.WebProfile:
GT-1000 is the new name of the hugely popular and great value GEL-1000 series. Designed for moderate overpronators, the GT-1000 offers all the cushioning and support you need.

The GT-1000 is the lightest model yet, featuring a slightly lowered midsole height to create more flexibility and responsiveness.

The new Full Length Guidance Line adds a groove along the length of the outsole to guide your foot in a more efficient gait.

Besides ample cushioning from its Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL units, this edition contains the DuoMax Support System in the midsole to create enhanced support and stability.

Product.WebProfile:
Designed in collaboration with the Dutch National Team, the GEL-VOLLEY ELITE 2 addresses the need for a lightweight, low cut volleyball shoe for agile players with great jumping power.

The combination of this model’s new dual-density midsole and the Propulsion Trusstic was shown to enhance both vertical and horizontal jumping power.

This edition is also significantly lighter without sacrificing on cushioning. The Forefoot and Rearfoot GEL continue to provide excellent cushioning on indoor courts.

The redesigned upper offers better durability. The Asymmetrical Lacing Design and Personal Heel Fit further ensure an optimal, personalised fit.

For optimal traction on court surfaces the outsole is made of Wet Grip Rubber.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Recharge every step of your run. A performance oriented shoe that helps you run more naturally.
Product.WebProfile:
The second edition of the GEL-HYPER33 continues to innovate with technology that helps you run more naturally.

The GEL-HYPER33 2 introduces the new FluidAxis, adding uniquely positioned deep flex grooves in the outsole to allow for a more natural motion of the subtalar joint.

This edition also contains an extended Propulsion Trusstic. Mimicking the plantar fascia in the arch of your foot, it assists your foot in propelling you forward.

The Full Length Guidance Line along the outsole promotes a more efficient gait from foot down to toe off.

The heel contains Rearfoot GEL for great cushioning, while the Dual Density Midsole, made of an EVA top layer and a Solyte layer, create a great balance of cushioning, stability and responsiveness.

Anatomically correct deep flex grooves have been aligned to the joints of the foot. This innovative construction enables the shoe to recognize, adapt, and respond to the athlete's exact load and positional change from first impact to toe-off.
The full length double density midsole features a lower density top layer for improved cushioning and comfort. The bottom layer has a higher density that provides stability and responsiveness.

The GEL-ESTORIL COURT GS contains Forefoot GEL Cushioning to absorb impact shock and allow easy forward and sideways movement.

The shoe’s Trusstic System reduces the weight of the sole and creates more flexibility, while retaining the supportive quality of the shoe.

GT-2000 is the new name of the latest model in the award-winning GEL-2000 series. Naturally it continues to deliver impressive comfort and fit for overpronators.

The new Guidance Trusstic is designed to work with the Guidance Line along the outsole. Together they encourage a more efficient gait, guiding your foot from heel strike to toe-off, while also giving support to the midfoot.

Also new in the GT-2000 is the Dynamic DuoMax Support System, a dual density midsole with a softer top layer for more sensory feedback and added comfort.

The full length and double density Solyte midsole has a top layer that's softer and better cushioned.

The lightweight Hotmelt upper, containing less stitches and less potential for irritation, improves comfort.

With its excellent cushioning and fit, the GT-2000 is perfect for longer runs.

The new GEL KAYANO 20 is lighter and gives you cushioning that is better than ever. 

Innovative Fluid Ride technology is a 2-layered sole and gives you improved cushioning and much better bounce-back.

Plus, the lightweight mesh upper features new Fluid Fit technology, which means you get both comfort and unrestrictive running.

The Dynamic DuoMax technology gives extra support and stability for overpronators.

And the Guidance Line technology guides your foot from impact through to push-off. That gives you a more efficient running style.

A lightweight and well-cushioned hiking shoe, the new GEL-FUJI STORM is ideal for all your shorter and longer off-road hikes and walks.

This model includes both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning to absorb shock, while the DuoTrusstic assists your foot in toe-off to create a great active ride.

The SpEVA midsole and SpEVA lasting create extra cushioning and stability on rough terrain.

The Personal Heel Fit memory foam fits snugly around the heel to create a personalised fit.

The rubberised toe offers protection on uneven terrain, while the Wet Grip Outsole ensures excellent grip on wet surfaces. It is reinforced with AHAR+ for enhanced durability.

The shoe’s Rearfoot GEL Cushioning absorbs impact shock upon landing and allows for a smooth transition from landing to midstance.

The GEL-BLACKHEATH 4 GS features cleats suitable for both sand and water-based turfs.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Great support on all your training runs. Combining performance and stability for late-stage overpronators.
Product.WebProfile:
The famous GEL-3000 series has a new name: GT-3000. But the shoe's mission hasn't changed: to optimally combine performance and stability for late-stage overpronators.

The GT-3000 is significantly lighter and has a slightly lowered midsole to create more flexibility and responsiveness.

Its new Guidance Trusstic is designed to work with the Guidance Line along the outsole, encouraging a smooth and more efficient gait while giving support to the midfoot.

Unique in the GT-3000 is the forefoot DuoMax, which helps late-stage overpronators to a more efficient push-off. It also contains the Dynamic DuoMax Support System, a dual density midsole that offers superb stability.

This model features Gender Specific Cushioning, creating a softer top layer in the midsole to improve cushioning and comfort for women.

The Clutch Counter creates a snug, supportive and dynamic fit around your heel.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Superb cushioning on active walks. A lightweight fitness walking shoe with excellent cushioning and support.
Product.WebProfile:
The GEL-TECH WALKER ULTRA is a brand new and lightweight fitness walking shoe with excellent cushioning. It incorporates some exciting running technologies to help you walk more efficiently.

The GEL-TECH WALKER ULTRA includes a Space Trusstic System in the midsole that encourages a more efficient gait, especially when your feet get tired.

This model contains both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning to absorb impact shock upon landing and take-off.

The lightweight Solyte midsole material creates additional cushioning, while the DuoMax Support System in the midsole enhances support and stability.

On the upper, the Asymmetrical Lacing Design follows the shape of your foot to reduce the potential for irritation and provide improved comfort and fit.

The outsole is reinforced with AHAR+ to ensure optimal durability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Protection on rainy days. Run comfortably in a pair of waterproof running shoes.
Product.WebProfile:
The new GT-2000 G-TX has a Fluid Ride midsole made of 2 cushioned layers – giving you much more comfort and bounce-back.

Engineered using Gore-Tex materials, they also work to keep you dry and comfortable in wet weather.

The midsole is slightly firmer than the GEL-KAYANO, which gives you a more responsive ride while you run.

The Guidance Line technology guides your foot from impact through to push-off. That gives you a more efficient and comfortable running style.

And these trainers cut down irritation with less stitching around the new upper.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum support on all your runs. The stable trainer for large-framed runners with neutral gaits.
Product.WebProfile:
With its stable, supportive platform, the GEL-FORTITUDE 6 is the perfect shoe for large-framed runners with neutral gaits.

This edition includes a Solyte-Plus midsole, making the shoe significantly lighter than previous models while offering the same firm support.

The new Guidance Line along the sole guides your foot to help improve your running efficiency.

The Personal Heel Fit memory foam ensures a snug and customised fit.

The GEL-FORTITUDE 6 features a new and lightweight upper design. The forefoot still contains a Bunion Window, giving your forefoot room to spread out comfortably with each stride.

The outsole is reinforced with ASICS High Abrasion Rubber for better durability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Superb cushioning for your training runs. A cushioned trainer with a super plush platform feel.
Product.WebProfile:
A cushioned trainer with a super plush platform feel, the GEL-Cumulus 15 provides better comfort than ever.

New in this edition is the full-length SpEVA lasting delivering extra bounce back. Along with the Visible Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL, it absorbs shock when your foot lands to provide a fantastic cushioned ride.

It also includes the Full Length Guidance Line, a groove along the sole that guides your foot through the gait cycle and helps you run more efficiently, even when fatigue sets in.

The Discrete Eyestay Construction on the upper improves the overall fit by allowing each eyelet to pull directly from the base of the shoe.

The GEL-CUMULUS 15 G-TX features a weatherproof yet breathable GORE-TEX upper to protect your foot in extreme weather conditions.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum stability on the netball court. A popular netball shoe offering stability and excellent cushioning.
Product.WebProfile:
The 15th edition of the popular GEL-NETBURNER series continues to deliver the stability and excellent cushioning that netball players need.

The DuoMax material in the midsole is positioned to enhance support and stability for short sprints and turns.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, and allows easy forward and sideways movement.

The GEL-NETBURNER 15 also includes a Space Trusstic System that encourages your foot to run more efficiently.

It also has a 10mm heel drop which takes pressure off your Achilles heel and calf by raising your rearfoot.

On the upper the Personal Heel Fit and the Asymmetrical Lacing Design combine to create a personalised and snug fit.

The outsole is reinforced with AHAR+ rubber to make it more durable.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Extra push-off power on the trail. A new lightweight shoe with a direct ride that’s made for speed on trails .
Product.WebProfile:
The new GEL-FUJI ELITE is a lightweight trail shoe with a direct ride that’s made for speed on trails and unpaved roads.

Inspired by the ASICS Speed collection, the GEL-FUJI ELITE features a Propulsion Plate to create a stiffer forefoot and a great spring-off feel to help keep your speed.

The shoe combines a very direct road feel and great stability, courtesy of both the Trusstic in the midfoot and the aggressive lugs on the outsole.

It features a lower heel to forefoot gradient, helping your foot to go faster through the gait cycle and making it easier to keep your speed going downhill.

The Clutch Counter creates a dynamic, supportive and snug fit around your heel.

The lightweight Hotmelt upper contains less stitching and less potential for irritation. It is made of non-water absorbing materials to prevent the shoe from getting heavy in wet conditions.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum comfort on long training runs. The leading structured cushioning shoe with a great blend of cushioning and support.
Product.WebProfile:
The latest edition in the award-winning GEL-KAYANO series reinforces its lead in the structured cushioning category.

The GEL-KAYANO 19 is significantly lighter while maintaining its famous blend of cushioning and support that's perfect for mild to moderate overpronators.

An exciting new technology is the Guidance Trusstic, designed to work with the Guidance Line along the outsole. Together they encourage a more efficient gait while lending support to the midfoot.

The Clutch Counter creates a snug, supportive and dynamic fit around your heel. It also gives a bit more stability on the inside of your foot to compensate for overpronation.

The lightweight Hotmelt upper, with less stitches and less potential for irritation, provides improved comfort.

The GEL-KAYANO 19 is ideal for long training runs, offering both the support and comfort you need.

Product.StandfirstDescription: A cushioned ride for kids. Great value running shoe for kids offering cushioning and durability.
Product.WebProfile:
The GEL-GALAXY 6 SL PS is an all-round cushioned trainer offering great value for kids who like to run.

It has a narrower shape than adult models to improve fit for children’s feet.

The Rearfoot GEL Cushioning absorbs shock when your foot lands and provides a fantastic ride. The Trusstic System reduces the shoe’s weight while creating better stability in the midfoot.

The outsole is reinforced with ASICS High Abrasion Rubber to reduce excessive wear, and it has a stitched toe to make it more durable.

The GEL-GALAXY 6 SL PS edition features a synthetic leather upper for greater durability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Superb training comfort. A high-end women’s training shoe offering superb comfort and flexibility.
Product.WebProfile:
Combining training performance with a sleek feminine design, the new AYAMi DRIVE is a high-end and lightweight training shoe offering superb comfort and flexibility.

This low cut gym shoe boasts a fantastic ride, containing both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning.

The dual density midsole ensures comfort and stability for fitness movements, while the Ortholite sockliner adds an extra layer of comfort. It can be removed for washing.

The External Heel Counter combines with the Personal Heel Fit, a collar of memory foam line in the heel, to create a snug and personalized fit.

The AYAMi DRIVE features an Air Mesh upper for excellent breathability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Optimal performance for your races. A lightweight racing flat offering support and durability.

The GEL-TARTHER 2 is a lightweight racing flat, clocking in at a mere 215 grams while still offering support and durability.

The shoe’s Rearfoot GEL Cushioning System absorbs shock when your foot lands and combines with the Solyte midsole to offer a comfortable ride.

It also contains the ASICS Racing Specific Last which creates a very snug fit.

The lightweight DuoSole Outsole creates flexibility while maintaining traction and durability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Off-road comfort and protection. A long-standing off-road favourite delivering comfort and protection.
Product.WebProfile:
A long-standing off-road favourite, the GEL-FUJI TRABUCO delivers comfort and protection. This edition introduces a new upper that’s cleaner and more comfortable.

This all-round trail shoe has a full ground contact midsole and features a DuoMax Support System to create a very stable ride. The aggressive outsole gives you lots of traction.

The Forefoot and Rearfoot GEL Cushioning ensure superb comfort and protection, while the Rock Protection Plate is essential for protecting your foot on rugged and rocky surfaces.

The GEL-FUJI TRABUCO 2 also features 90 degrees outsole lugs to provide optimal traction on rough and steep terrain.

The Monosock Construction on the upper is designed to keep dirt and debris out of the shoe. The External Heel Counter further adds to a snug, customised fit.

The GEL-FUJI TRABUCO 2 G-TX features a breathable GORE-TEX upper for protection in extreme weather conditions.

Designed to meet the demands of modern handball, the GEL-BLAST 5 offers handball players the stability and ground control they need.

This edition’s Flexion Fit Construction optimises fit and comfort, and will also add stability.

The shoe’s Extended Trusstic adds stability and enhances running power, along with a Propulsion Plate for more stability in the forefoot.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, and allows easy forward and sideways movement.

To create better traction on indoor surfaces the outsole is made of Wet Grip Rubber, while the Magic Sole ensures breathability.

The Personal Heel Fit and Asymmetrical Lacing Design combine to create a secure and personalised fit.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum stability on the tennis court. The stable and durable shoe of choice for professional tennis players.
Product.WebProfile:
The shoe of choice for professional tennis players, the GEL-RESOLUTION 5 offers stability and durability tailored especially to baseline players.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, and allows easy forward and sideways movement.

The T-Truss, an extended Trusstic, offers additional stability in the heel, particularly for the jumping forehand stroke.

The Flexion Fit in the forefoot combines mesh and rubber to create a breathable and very flexible yet durable upper.

The Discrete Eyeletstay lacing design creates a snug, customised fit.

The shoe's outsole is slightly thicker on the medial side of your foot to accommodate for sideways movements.

The GEL-RESOLUTION 5 CLAY features an outsole optimised for grip on clay courts.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Exceptional comfort on all your runs. The flagship cushioning shoe offering the ultimate plush ride.
Product.WebProfile:
The flagship cushioning shoe in the ASICS collection, the GEL-NIMBUS 15 provides exceptional comfort and cushioning for neutral and underpronating runners.

This 15th edition can safely be called the most comfortable edition ever. It introduces a new upper of FluidFit two-direction stretch mesh. Along with the Heel Clutching System and Discrete Eyestay Construction it ensures a superb customised fit.

Also adding to the shoe’s great comfort are the full-length SpEVA lasting and the innovative FluidRide midsole construction which provide the ultimate plush ride.

The women’s model features Gender Specific Cushioning, making the midsole’s top layer softer. Along with PLUS3, which adds 3mm to the heel height, it delivers a fantastic platform feel designed specifically for women.

The Full Length Guidance Line, a groove along the sole, guides your foot through the gait cycle and helps you run more efficiently, even when fatigue sets in.

With its high-tech cushioned ride the GEL-NIMBUS 15 is your ideal partner on long runs.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Recognise, adapt, respond. An ultra natural and adaptive ride designed for serious runners.
Product.WebProfile:
The second edition of the GEL-LYTE33, available in Europe for the first time, offers an ultra natural ride designed for serious runners.

The GEL-LYTE33 2 introduces the new FluidAxis, adding uniquely positioned deep flex grooves in the outsole to allow for a more natural motion of the subtalar joint.

Aligned to the joints of your foot, the asymmetrical Dual Density Midsole works in harmony with the Guidance Line along the outsole to optimise flexibility for an adaptive and responsive ride.

The GEL-LYTE33 2 also contains Rearfoot GEL for great cushioning.

The shoe’s outsole is reinforced with ASICS High Abrasion Resistance rubber for optimal durability.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
Vertical flex groove decouples the tooling along the line of progression for enhanced gait efficiency.

Anatomically correct deep flex grooves have been aligned to the joints of the foot. This innovative construction enables the shoe to recognize, adapt, and respond to the athlete's exact load and positional change from first impact to toe-off.
The full length double density midsole features a lower density top layer for improved cushioning and comfort. The bottom layer has a higher density that provides stability and responsiveness.
Enhances shock attenuation during propulsion.
Acronym for ASICS® High Abrasion Rubber. Placed in critical areas of the outsole for exceptional durability.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum speed on the netball court. A running-inspired well-cushioned shoe for agile netball players.
Product.WebProfile:
Catering to more agile netball players, the GEL-NETBURNER TASMAN 3 offers a fast running-inspired ride as well as excellent cushioning.

The shoe includes a Space Trusstic System that encourages your foot to run more efficiently.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, and allows easy forward and sideways movement.

The DuoMax material in the midsole is positioned to enhance support and stability for short sprints and turns.

The Personal Heel Fit adds a collar of memory foam in the heel to create a great personalised fit.

The outsole is reinforced with ASICS High Abrasion Resistance rubber to make it more durable.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA®. Also fetures enhanced cushioning and durability.
Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.
Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoes.
ASICS lightest midsole material takes on a new role as a lasting technology.
2 layers of memory foam line the collar and mold to the athlete's heel, creating a personalized fit.

Feature.FeatureName: Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL® Cushioning System
Feature.FeatureBenefit: Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
Acronym for ASICS® High Abrasion Rubber. Placed in critical areas of the outsole for exceptional durability.
A dual-density midsole system positioned to enhance support and stability, positioned sport-specifically.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Speed and comfort on the court. A low-profile volleyball shoe that combines speed and comfort.
Product.WebProfile:
The GEL-BEYOND has a lower profile to create the perfect volleyball shoe for those seeking a combination of speed and comfort.

This edition features the new Dynamic GEL Plate for more stability and to assist your foot in its forward movement.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off.

The Personal Heel Fit adds a line of memory foam in the heel to create a snug, personalised fit.

The outsole is made of Wet Grip rubber to create better traction on indoor surfaces, while the Magic Sole offers breathability.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA®. Also fetures enhanced cushioning and durability.
EVA sockliner moulded to the shape of the foot, which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.
For stability and comfort. Upper is stitched around a canvas or EVA board and directly attached to the midsole.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Natural running for kids. A supportive and responsible natural running shoe for kids.
Product.WebProfile:
The GEL-XALION GS is inspired by the ASICS natural running collection. It is designed to promote supportive and responsible natural running for grade school children.

The shoe’s lower heel drop and more flexible midsole offer a more natural road feel and running experience. This lightweight approach doesn’t compromise on support or durability.

The Rearfoot GEL Cushioning System protects your foot from the shock of impact when you run.

The EVA Removable Sockliner creates an additional soft lining inside the shoe that can be removed for washing or to accommodate an orthotic.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum speed on the football field. A lightweight football boot built for speed and performance.
Product.WebProfile:
Built for speed, the lightweight LETHAL TIGREOR 6 offers optimal performance for fast football players.

This shoe has a 10mm Heel Gradient, shifting your body mass forward to reduce strain on your legs and put you in the best position for running.

The Solyte midsole material reduces the shoe's weight while providing extra cushioning.

The LETHAL TIGREOR 6 features Multi-Function Cleats, providing better traction and responsiveness on both turf and grass fields.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA®. Also fetures enhanced cushioning and durability.
EVA sockliner moulded to the shape of the foot, which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.

This 10 mm difference in height between heel and forefoot offers the best biomechanical position. This protects and enhances forward motion, and reduces load on the achilles tendons, calf muscles, ham string and back.
For stability and durability. Upper is glued to a thin fiber board, then cemented to the midsole.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Comfortable fit and superior ride. Get maximum comfort with the 20th edition of this iconic running shoe.
Product.WebProfile:
The new GEL KAYANO 20 is lighter and gives you cushioning that is better than ever. 

Innovative Fluid Ride technology is a 2-layered sole and gives you improved cushioning and much better bounce-back.

Plus, the lightweight mesh upper features new Fluid Fit technology, which means you get both comfort and unrestrictive running.

The Dynamic DuoMax technology gives extra support and stability for overpronators.

And the Guidance Line technology guides your foot from impact through to push-off. That gives you a more efficient running style.

The LITE-SHOW edition features 360o visibility with all-over reflective details

Feature.FeatureBenefit: Removable sockliner that provides cushioning performance and anti-microbial properties for a cooler, dryer, healthier environment.
Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.
The latest evolution in ASICS midsole technology. FluidRide provides the ultimate in bounce back & cushioning characterics while being lightweight.
ASICS® design philosophy that employs linked componentry to enhance the foot's natual gait from heel strike to toe-off.
ASICS FluidFit technology combines a technical mesh that stretches in multiple directions with other stretch materials to create a glove like fit.
Reflective material produced by 3M company, for night safety.
New blown AHAR outsole material. Delivers enhanced cushioning, durability and ride to the foot.
ASICS midsole material takes on a new role as a lasting technology for enhanced cushioning and comfort.

Next generation DuoMax system provides greater comfort and enhances gait efficiency.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Optimal triathlon performance. The shoe of choice for triathletes, famous for its performance and colourful design.
Product.WebProfile:
Named after the Australian triathlon, the GEL-NOOSA TRI series is famous for its triathlon performance as well as its colourful, head-turning design.

The GEL-NOOSA TRI 8 features additional elastic laces to save time during race transitions, while the softer, non-slip lining material allows the shoe to be worn barefoot as well.

The bold new upper design features Australian and triathlon inspired imagery along with reflective details to make sure you're visible in low light conditions.

Racer-like but supportive, the GEL-NOOSA TRI 8 meets the needs of triathletes on race day.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Recharge every step of your run. A performance oriented shoe that helps you run more naturally.
Product.WebProfile:
The second edition of the successful GEL-EXCEL33 continues to innovate with technology that helps you run more naturally.

The GEL-EXCEL33 2 introduces the new FluidAxis, adding uniquely positioned deep flex grooves in the outsole to allow for a more natural motion of the subtalar joint.

This edition also contains an extended Propulsion Trusstic. Mimicking the plantar fascia in the arch of your foot, it assists your foot in propelling you forward.

The Full Length Guidance Line along the outsole promotes a more efficient gait from foot down to toe off.

The heel contains visible Rearfoot GEL for excellent cushioning, while the Dual Density Midsole, made of a SpEVA top layer and a Solyte layer, create a great balance of cushioning, stability and responsiveness.

The Clutch Counter creates a supportive fit around the heel, and together with the Personal Heel Fit memory foam ensures a superior, personalised fit.

Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.
Vertical flex groove decouples the tooling along the line of progression for enhanced gait efficiency.
Mimics connective tissue in the foot by creating tension as foot enters propulsion stage.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Go faster on your training runs and races. The iconic lightweight trainer made for fast-paced training and racing.
Product.WebProfile:
The new edition of this iconic speed shoe, the GEL-DS TRAINER 18 is lighter and offers a more direct road feel. It is perfect for fast-paced training and racing.

The newly designed Guidance Trusstic works with the Guidance Line along the outsole. Together they encourage a more efficient gait while giving support to the midfoot.

Besides Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe features the Dynamic DuoMax Support System in the midsole to create enhanced support and stability.

The Clutch Counter creates a snug and dynamic fit around your heel. The Hotmelt upper design contains less stitching, and less potential for irritation, to create a superb fit.

The outsole of the GEL-DS TRAINER 18 is made of WetGrip RubberSponge, designed to ensure grip even on wet surfaces.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Excellent cushioning on longer runs. With its excellent cushioning and fit, this shoe is perfect for longer runs.
Product.WebProfile:
GT-2000 is the new name of the latest model in the award-winning GEL-2000 series. Naturally it continues to deliver impressive comfort and fit for overpronators.

The new Guidance Trusstic is designed to work with the Guidance Line along the outsole. Together they encourage a more efficient gait, guiding your foot from heel strike to toe-off, while also giving support to the midfoot.

Also new in the GT-2000 is the Dynamic DuoMax Support System, a dual density midsole with a softer top layer for more sensory feedback and added comfort.

This model contains Gender Specific Cushioning, a softer top layer of the Solyte dual density midsole, designed to enhance cushioning and comfort for women.

The lightweight Hotmelt upper, containing less stitches and less potential for irritation, improves comfort.

With its excellent cushioning and fit, the GT-2000 is perfect for longer runs.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Optimal performance for your races. Geared for race day performance while providing ample support.
Product.WebProfile:
The 9th edition of the popular GEL-DS RACER is geared for race day performance, and ideal for overpronators.

The GEL-DS RACER 9 is the only ASICS racing shoe to feature a Solyte midsole with a DuoMax Support System, making the shoe lighter while still providing ample support.

It also contains the ASICS Racing Specific Last to create a very snug fit.

The new Magic Sole provides grip while improving ventilation, keeping fast feet cool.

Built on ASICS’ Racing Last.
Vented midsole and outsole minimizes weight and maximizes breathability.
A dual-density midsole system positioned to enhance support and stability, positioned sport-specifically.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Off-road comfort and protection. A long-standing off-road favourite delivering comfort and protection.
Product.WebProfile:
A long-standing off-road favourite, the GEL-FUJI TRABUCO NEUTRAL delivers comfort and protection. This edition introduces a new upper that’s cleaner and more comfortable.

The NEUTRAL version is specifically designed for trail runners with a neutral gait.

This all-round trail shoe has a full ground contact midsole to create a very stable ride. The aggressive outsole gives you lots of traction.

The Forefoot and Rearfoot GEL Cushioning ensure superb comfort and protection, while the Rock Protection Plate is essential for protecting your foot on rugged and rocky surfaces.

The GEL-FUJI TRABUCO 2 also features 90 degrees outsole lugs to provide optimal traction on rough and steep terrain.

The Monosock Construction on the upper is designed to keep dirt and debris out of the shoe. The External Heel Counter further adds to a snug, customised fit.

Feature.FeatureBenefit: A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA®. Also fetures enhanced cushioning and durability.
Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.
Protects the foot against sharp objects such as rocks and branches.
Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoes.
Reserved lugs provide uphill and downhill traction on all types of terrain.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum jumping power. A lightweight volleyball shoe for agile players with great jumping power.
Product.WebProfile:
Designed in collaboration with the Dutch National Team, the GEL-VOLLEY ELITE 2 addresses the need for a lightweight, low cut volleyball shoe for agile players with great jumping power.

The combination of this model’s new dual-density midsole and the Propulsion Trusstic was shown to enhance both vertical and horizontal jumping power.

This edition is also significantly lighter without sacrificing on cushioning. The Forefoot and Rearfoot GEL continue to provide excellent cushioning on indoor courts.

The redesigned upper offers better durability. The Asymmetrical Lacing Design and Personal Heel Fit further ensure an optimal, personalised fit.

For optimal traction on court surfaces the outsole is made of Wet Grip Rubber.

The GEL-VOLLEY ELITE 2 MT is the mid cut version, offering extra support and a snug fit.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Maximum speed on the court. A low-profile, high-tech shoe for agile squash and badminton players.
Product.WebProfile:
The high-tech GEL-BLADE 4 has been designed exclusively for the fast indoor court sports of squash and badminton. Catering to quick and agile players, it has a low profile and great responsiveness.

A squash professional who tested the GEL-BLADE 4 called it “the quickest and most comfortable squash shoe I’ve ever worn.”

In this edition the new pivot points and the new flex grooves in the outsole, dividing the medial and lateral forefoot, promote more efficient and aggressive turns and sideward movements.

The shoe’s Transition Midsole supports quick changes in direction, while the more centred and rounded heel accommodates for lunging movements.

To ensure optimal traction on court surfaces, the outsole is made of Wet Grip Rubber, with a large Pivot Point in the forefoot for easier and faster turning. The Magic Sole ensures breathability.

On the upper, the TPU protected vamp adds support and durability, while the Personal Heel Fit and Asymmetrical Lacing Design create a snug and personalised fit.

Product.StandfirstDescription: Play a faster game. The lightest tennis shoe on the market, made for more agile players.
Product.WebProfile:
The GEL-SOLUTION SPEED is the lightest tennis shoe on the market, and serves the needs of more agile players.

The Propulsion Trusstic creates a stable platform and enhances acceleration in sprinting and jumping.

With both Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning, the shoe absorbs impact shock upon landing and take-off, and allows easy forward and sideways movement.

The Solyte midsole material reduces the shoe's weight while creating extra cushioning.

The outsole is reinforced with ASICS High Abrasion Resistance rubber to make it more durable.
